tags.name: Notes
tags.description: Operations for creating and managing notes

bearerAuth.description: Use a Bearer token for authentication. The token should be prefixed with "Bearer ".

content.description:
The plaintext content of the note.

## Markdown

If `contentFormat=markdown`, then this will be parsed as Markdown.

You can embed images, videos and other media into your note.
However, you can't reference remote URLs, you must first uploaded it to Rough as an asset.
See the `POST /api/v1/asset` endpoint for more information.

Assets can then be embedded using the Markdown image syntax,
referencing the asset ID, for example:
`![](rough://asset/01K4SNV7ERV0TMYNQ3TC728Y4Y)`.

If the asset is not found, then this endpoint will not create an note, and
instead return a 400 error.

id.description: The unique identifier of the document

publicId.description: The public identifier of the document

createdByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the document

ownedByPersonId.description: The unique identifier of the person that owns the document

vcsTagList.description: The list of VCS tags associated with the document

archivedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was archived

archivedByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user who archived the document

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was last modified

releasedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was released

email.description: [Deprecated] The personâ€™s primary email address. Use emailList instead.

emailList.description: All email addresses associated with this person. The first address is the primary address.

post.description: Upload a file to the workspace. The file will be processed and stored as an Asset.
